description: After your creatures manually {ACTION_cast} a {CLASS_Death} spell, you gain 1 [infusion_death]Death Infusion. After any of your creatures manually {ACTION_cast} a spell, they afflict enemies with 1 random debuff as long as you have at least 1 [infusion_death]Death Infusion, plus 1 additional random debuff for every 3 [infusion_death]Death Infusions you have beyond that.
name: Death Infusion
